title: inserting multiple atlas robots causes gazebo to segfault with Ogre::ItemIdentityException

content.raw:
~~~
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'Ogre::ItemIdentityException'
  what():  OGRE EXCEPTION(4:ItemIdentityException): A scene node with the name default::head_hokuyo_sensorOrthoPitchNode already exists in SceneManager::createSceneNode at /build/buildd/ogre-1.8-1.8.1+dfsg/OgreMain/src/OgreSceneManager.cpp (line 842)
~~~

This is true even after deleting the first model, indicating model deletion left something behind.
content.html:
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'Ogre::ItemIdentityException'
  what():  OGRE EXCEPTION(4:ItemIdentityException): A scene node with the name default::head_hokuyo_sensorOrthoPitchNode already exists in SceneManager::createSceneNode at /build/buildd/ogre-1.8-1.8.1+dfsg/OgreMain/src/OgreSceneManager.cpp (line 842)

This is true even after deleting the first model, indicating model deletion left something behind.
